card.name: 'Mech Smuggling
card.property:
Scrap this card when it is revealed.
Hide 1 to 5 counters; if opponent guesses the number of counters you hid, scrap that many cards from your Stockpile. Otherwise, search your Stockpile for up to 2 'Mech cards, show those cards to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Stockpile afterward.

card.name: Annihilator (ANH-1A)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +2 attack <i>Annihilator</i> cannot block unless guarding. <i>No one, except perhaps ComStar, knows exactly where the <i>Annihilator</i> comes from, or how Wolf's Dragoons kept so many for so long.</i>

card.name: Arc-Royal Defense Cordon
card.property: A deck may contain only one Alliance card. Begin the game with this card activated. Alliances are not sites and cannot be scrapped. If Arc-Royal Defense Cordon is in your deck, every Wolf card or unaffiliated Clan card in your deck gains the Inner Sphere alignment and the Steiner affiliation. Your non-Support cards cost 0+2P more to activate.

card.name: Aris Sung
card.property: +2 initiative, +2 attack Count the number of Units in the group that includes 'Mech piloted by Aris Sung. Prevent up to that much damage to one of those Units. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Avatar (AV1-OB)
card.property: Missile 4 <i>Because of the <i>Avatar</i>'s twin fixed lasers, this configuration is the closest it can come to being a missile boat in the classic sense.</i>

card.name: Backing of the Grand Council
Battle Attrition
card.property: Your opponents cannot repair their Units, cannot use their Units' Alpha Strike options, and must deplete their Units in order to use their Missile options. During his or her Repair/Reload phase, an opponent may pay {R}{R}{R} to ignore this card's effects for that turn.

card.name: Battle Cobra A
card.property: Overheat 2: +2 attack <i>This <i>Battle Cobra</i>'s weapons array sacrifices range for the close-in devastation of medium pulse lasers.</i>

card.name: Battle Cobra B
card.property: Overheat 3: +2 attack Long-Range 2 (If <i>Battle Cobra</i> B is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target.) <i>Like its namesake, this Cobra can strike its prey from afar.</i>

card.name: Battle Cobra Prime
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Long-Range 1 (If <i>Battle Cobra</i> Prime is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: Blackjack (BJ-3)
card.property: Overheat 3: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Duchess Candace Liao ordered this recommission of the original Blackjack, then gave several to House Davion as a peace offering.</i>

card.name: Blackjack (BJ2-OA)
card.property: Missile 2 Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>This configuration of the <i>Blackjack</i> OmniMech is rolled out when fire support is needed.</i>

card.name: Black Hawk-KU (BHKU-O)
card.property: Overheat 3: +3 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Captured Clan <i>Black Hawks</i> gave Kurita designers the knowledge to reproduce Omni technology.</i>

card.name: Black Hawk-KU (BHKU-OC)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Long-Range 1 (If <i>Black Hawk-KU</i> is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.) <i>The Gauss rifle mounted in this Black Hawk's left arm allows a greater firing arc.</i>

card.name: Black Lanner D
card.property: AP (<i>Black Lanner D</i> deals +1 damage to any target other than a Unit.) <i>Bristling with short-range and anti-personnel weaponry, this configuration is used in battlefields expected to be crawling with infantry.</i>

card.name: Black Watch (BKW-7R)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) C3 (Each Unit with C3 in a group that includes at least one other Unit with C3 gets +2 attack.)

card.name: Blaze of Glory
card.property: Play only when a Unit you control is the target. Double all damage dealt by that Unit.

card.name: Breaking the Envelope
card.property:
Play only during battle.
Choose one of your Units. Whenever you use one of that Unit's Overheat options, double the option's damage and attack bonus.

card.name: Cataphract (CTF-1X)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Alpha Strike: +1 attack <i>Intended to be the mainstay of elite Capellan regiments, the <i>Cataphract</i> was House Liao's first success at designing a heavy BattleMech.</i>

card.name: Cerberus (MR-5M)
card.property: Overheat 4: +3 attack Anti-Missile (Prevent 1 damage from each missile fired at a Unit in a group that includes <i>Cerberus</i>.) Long-Range 2 (If <i>Cerberus</i> is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: Cestus (CTS-6Y)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Long-Range 1 (If <i>Cestus</i> is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.) <i>Problems with overheating led the Cestus's designers to replace its PPCs with a Gauss rifle.</i>

card.name: Champion (CHP-2N)
card.property:
Overheat 1: +2 attack
<i>With a third of its mass devoted to a Vlar 300 fusion engine, the <i>Champion</i> is under-armored and outgunned compared to other members of its weight class.</i>

card.name: Charger (CGR-1A5)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +2 attack <i>The <i>Charger CGR-1A5</i> is a much more viable design than many that came before it. It retreats usually because it's out of ammunition, rather than in danger of being destroyed.</i>

card.name: Charger (CGR-1L)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack You may deploy <i>Charger</i> revealed to make an additional deployment this turn. <i>After the disaster on Chara, House Liao tried to salvage its <i>Charger</i>s with this conversion.</i>

card.name: Close Formation
Conquer
card.property:
Play only when attacking a Unit or Command card and only if you lost initiative.
If the target would be scrapped later this mission, instead tap it, remove all damage counters from it, and gain control of it.

card.name: Coup De Grâce
card.property:
Choose an opposing Unit. Double the number of damage counters put on that Unit when resolving damage.
<i>The Clan approach is simple and ruthless: Do not waste time or resources repairing severe damage.</i>

card.name: Crossbow A
card.property: <i>While certain OmniMechs are traditionally equipped only with arm-mounted weapons, the <i>Crossbow</i> and <i>Battle Cobra</i> cannot mount weapons anywhere else.</i>

card.name: Crossbow B
card.property: <i>This configuration, used for shorter-range fighting, exchanges LRM racks for SRMs.</i>

card.name: Cyclops (CP-11-C)
card.property: C3 (Each Unit with C3 in a group that includes at least one other Unit with C3 gets +2 attack.) Long-Range 1 (If <i>Cyclops</i> is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: DEST Commando Sabotage
card.property:
Scrap this card when it is revealed.
Do 2 structure damage to each opposing Unit.

card.name: Enfield (END-6Q)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +1 attack

card.name: Entrenched Holdings
card.property:
When you activate this card, put it in one of your regions and scrap all other Terrain cards in that region.
If this card is in your Command Post, Units guarding any site in your Command Post are also considered to be guarding each of your Support cards there.

card.name: Entropy-Based Warfare
card.property: Each opposing Unit under construction costs {R} more to activate.

card.name: Exterminator (EXT-4A)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Though the original <i>Exterminator</i>'s technology is lost, the EXT-4A is still ideally suited for raids against high-profile targets.</i>

card.name: Falsified Maps
card.property:
Play only when being attacked.
Search your Stockpile for any Terrain card and put it into play, activated, in the region containing the target. Shuffle your Stockpile afterward.

card.name: Fast Deployment
card.property:
Scrap this card when it is revealed.
You may make up to three additional deployments this turn.

card.name: Firestarter (FS9-OF)
card.property: Overheat 3: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The Free Worlds League Military's configuration of the <i>Firestarter</i> showcases the League's new laser weapons.</i>

card.name: Fire Falcon B
card.property:
Overheat 1: +1 attack
<i>Twin extended-range lasers and a targeting computer make this fast 'Mech ideally suited to holding actions, a "dishonorable" duty usually left to MechWarriors who have fallen out of favor in their units.</i>

card.name: Fire Falcon D
card.property: NARC (Units in groups including any with NARC may subtract 1 from the die roll of each missile they fire.) <i>The Jade Falcons insist on single combat, so this configuration rarely appears in front-line units.</i>

card.name: Fire From Partial Cover
card.property:
Play only if you lost initiative.
Prevent up to 2 damage to each of your Units.

card.name: Force of Will
card.property:
One of your piloted 'Mechs gets +4 attack, and you may prevent 1 damage to that 'Mech.
<i>Laser-bright your eyes,Heartbeat stronger than your foe's,You will conquer all.|Kurita battle haiku</i>

card.name: Fury
card.property: Vehicle (If Fury is damaged, roll a die. On a 5 or 6, scrap it.) Long-Range 1 (If Fury is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.) <i>This tank's as implacable and unstoppable as the Furies of myth and legend, meting out madness and death to those who step in its path.</i>

card.name: Goshawk (Vapor Eagle)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Its unusual design and bizarre weapons configurations make the <i>Goshawk</i>'s true purpose a mystery to Inner Sphere analysts.</i>

card.name: Grand Crusader (GRN-D-01)
card.property: Missile 3 Overheat 5: +4 attack Anti-Missile (Prevent 1 damage from each missile fired at a Unit in a group that includes <i>Grand Crusader</i>.

card.name: Grendel B
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The <i>Grendel</i> was among the first units to engage ComStar on Tukayyid. Only lack of support prevented them from doing extensive damage to the Com Guards' lines.</i>

card.name: Grendel C
card.property: Alpha Strike: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Anti-Missile (Prevent 1 damage from each missile fired at a Unit in a group that includes <i>Grendel</i> C.)

card.name: Hankyu C
card.property: Overheat 3: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Alternate configuration C modifies the <i>Hankyu</i> for extended scouting missions.</i>

card.name: Hankyu Prime
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) ECM (Units in groups including any with ECM each get +1 armor.) <i>Inner Sphere pilots quickly learned to recognize the <i>Hankyu</i>'s boxy shoulder pods.</i>

card.name: Hasty Alliance
card.property:
Scrap this card when it is revealed.
Activate this card only if you have any Unique Command cards in play.
Search your Stockpile for any Unique Command card and put it into your Command Post, activated, at no cost. Shuffle your Stockpile afterwards.

card.name: Heat of Battle
card.property: Your attacking groups of two or more Units can be blocked only by groups of two or more Units.

card.name: Heat Sink Destruction
card.property:
When you activate this card, play it on any opposing Unit with at least one damage counter. Tap that Unit.
Unit enhanced by this card gets -X attack and gains "Overheat X: +X attack," where X is equal to the Unit's base attack.
You may deploy this card revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Hollander (BZK-F3)
card.property: Long-Range 1 (If <i>Hollander</i> is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.) You may deploy Hollander revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Huron Warrior (HUR-W0-R4M)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Long-Range 1 (If <i>Huron Warrior</i> is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.) <i>This <i>Huron Warrior</i> variant adds armor to the legs to defend against Clan Elementals.</i>

card.name: Icy Terrain
Improved Construction Facilities
card.property: {T}: {R}{R}{R} Logistics (At the end of your turn, you may restock one card from your hand.)

card.name: Indiscriminate Terrorism
Intimidation Tactics
card.property: Play only during battle and only if you lost initiative. Each opposing Unit gets -1 attack.

card.name: Isolated Forces
card.property:
When you activate this card, do 5 damage to your Stockpile.
Opposing Units do not untap during the Untap phases. During each opponent's Repair/Reload phase, that opponent may spend any amount of {R} to untap that many of his or her Units.

card.name: It's a Trap!
card.property:
Scrap this card when it is revealed.
Activate this card only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission.
Choose any opponent. For every 2 counters above the cost of this card, choose one of his or her Units. Those Units attack any legal target of your choice as a single mission.

card.name: Judith Faber
card.property: Each player who controls any Clan cards plays with the top card of his or her Stockpile face up and shows each card he or she draws to all opponents.

card.name: Khan Vlad Ward
card.property: Counts as Vlad of the Wards while in play. {T}: Choose any opposing Unit. If that Unit does not attack during your opponent's next turn, scrap it. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. • Khan, Clan Wolf

card.name: Knights of the Inner Sphere
card.property:
Whenever an opposing Unit is scrapped from play, if Knights of the Inner Sphere is untapped, you may allow that opponent to restock that Unit after scrapping it. If you do so, put a chivalry counter on Knights of the Inner Sphere.
{T}: One of your Units gets +X attack, where X is the number of chivalry counters on Knights of the Inner Sphere. Use this ability only during battle.

card.name: Kraken 2 (Bane)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +4 attack <i>Each arm of this <i>Kraken</i> variant mounts two Ultra AC/10s and a staggering seven tons of AC ammunition, allowing it to fire eighteen salvos even at double rate.</i>

card.name: Loose Cannon
card.property: Scrap the top card of your Stockpile to give 'Mech piloted by Loose Cannon +X initiative and +X attack, where X is that card's base construction cost. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Marthe Pryde
card.property: +2 initiative 'Mech piloted by Marthe Pryde gets +2 attack for each Jade Falcon Unit in the group that includes that 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission. • Khan, Clan Jade Falcon

card.name: Maskirovka Sabotage
card.property:
Play only during battle.
Roll a die: 1: Draw a card after the mission. 2-6: Choose an opposing Unit. All damage dealt by that Unit in excess of its base attack is redirected to that Unit.

card.name: MechWarrior Trent
card.property: {T}: Your next mission this turn cannot be blocked if the target is not a Stockpile and the defending player controls any Clan cards. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission.

card.name: Michael Ryan
Move to Dubious Cover
card.property:
Play only when blocking.
Half the total damage dealt to one of your Units, rounded up, is dealt to the target instead.

card.name: Naga B
card.property: Overheat 3: +3 attack {T}: Choose any 'Mech or the target and deal 2 damage to it. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Natural Talent
card.property:
+2 attack
Roll a die. 1-6: You get +(1-6) initiative. Use this ability only during battle.

card.name: Nexus (NXS1-A)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Anti-Missile (Prevent 1 damage from each missile fired at a Unit in a group that includes Nexus.)

card.name: Night Gyr D

property.name: Allegiance
property.value: Omni - Clan - Jade Falcon - Smoke Jaguar

card.property: Missile 6 Overheat 3: +5 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The <i>Night Gyr D</i> boasts the second-highest missile capacity of any 'Mech yet seen in the field.</i>

card.name: Night Gyr Prime
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Long-Range 2 (If <i>Night Gyr Prime</i> is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: Paul Moon
card.property: Battle Armor (Cannot attack or block alone, but does so at the speed of the fastest OmniMech, if any, in the group that includes it.) Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) AP (Paul Moon deals +1 damage to any target other than a Unit.) Each other Battle Armor in a group that includes Paul Moon gets +1 attack. Use this ability only during a mission. • Star Colonel

card.name: Perigard Zalman
card.property: {T}: Put any Mission card from your Scrapheap into your hand. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission. • Khan, Clan Steel Viper

card.name: Perseus (P1A)
card.property: Missile 3 ECM (Units in groups including any with ECM each get +1 armor.) <i>The <i>Perseus</i> borrows so heavily from the Orion that it is often called the "Omni-Orion."</i>

card.name: Political Stranglehold
card.property:
Scrap this card when it is revealed.
Choose any opponent. During that opponent's next turn, every card he or she draws is scrapped.

card.name: Raptor (RTX1-OA)
card.property: <i>As the DCMS's first homegrown OmniMech, the <i>Raptor-A</i> serves as a test platform for all-laser configurations.</i>

card.name: Raptor (RTX1-OE)
card.property: <i>The <i>Raptor</i>'s Echo configuration uses the DCMS's new medium- range missiles, designed to be cheap and easy to use. Its MRM launchers are arranged identically to the Raptor-B's SRMs.</i>

card.name: Rhino
card.property: Vehicle (If Rhino is damaged, roll a die. On a 5 or 6, scrap it.) Missile 3

card.name: Rommel
card.property: Vehicle (If Rommel is damaged, roll a die. On a 5 or 6, scrap it.) Alpha Strike: +2 attack <i>Named for a long-dead general, the Rommel's 'Mech Hunter autocannon is perfect for hunting its prey.</i>

card.name: Shadow Cat Prime
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Long-Range 1 (If <i>Shadow Car</i> Prime is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: Solahma MechWarrior
card.property: +1 initiative, +1 attack 'Mech piloted by Solahma MechWarrior gets an additional +2 initiative and +2 attack. Use this ability only during battle.

card.name: SRM Carrier-3058
card.property: Vehicle (If SRM Carrier is damaged, roll a die. On a 5 or 6, scrap it.) NARC (Units in groups including any with NARC may subtract 1 from the die roll of each missile they fire.)

card.name: Starslayer (STY-3C)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The <i>Starslayer</i>'s primary function is to be the backbone of a 'Mech force.</i>

card.name: Star Commander
card.property: +1 initiative, +2 attack Reroll any die roll made by any player. Use this ability only during battle and immediately after that die roll.

card.name: Star League Proving Grounds
card.property:
{T}: {R}
{T}: One of your unaffiliated Units gets +1 attack and +1 armor. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Steady...Steady...FIRE!
card.property:
Play only if you lost initiative.
Roll all the missile dice for each of your Units' Missile options now. Whenever you use a Unit's Missile option, use these die rolls instead of rolling when damage resolves.

card.name: Steel Viper R & D Team
card.property: {T}: Draw a card. You may make an additional deployment this turn. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.

card.name: Strategic Bombardment
card.property: {T}: Choose any Resource card in play and deal 2 structure damage to it.

card.name: Striker (STC-2C)
card.property: <i>Though the <i>Striker</i> represented the pinnacle of BattleMech technology when it was introduced in the mid-26th century, technological advances soon overtook it. No new Strikers have been built in almost two centuries.</i>

card.name: Surprise Maneuvers
card.property:
Your opponent gets -2 initiative.
Draw a card.

card.name: Tactical Superiority
card.property:
You win initiative.
<i>The key to survive a battle is knowing when not to fight it.</i>

card.name: Task Force Serpent
card.property:
Scrap this card when it is revealed.
Search your Stockpile for up to 3 Unit cards and up to 2 Unique Command cards, show all those cards to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your Stockpile afterward.

card.name: Temptation
card.property: Each opponent must attack at least once each turn that he or she can. You may deploy this card revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: The Federated Commonwealth
card.property:
A deck may contain only one Alliance card. Begin the game with this card activated. Alliances are not sites and cannot be scrapped.
If The Federated Commonwealth is in your deck, every Davion card in your deck gains the Steiner affiliation, and vice-versa.
Your non-Resource Command cards cost {R} more to activate.

card.name: The Invading Clans
card.property:
A deck may contain only one Alliance card. Begin the game with this card activated. Alliances are not sites and cannot be scrapped.
If The Invading Clans is in your deck, every Clan card in your deck loses all affiliations.
When you assign damage during a mission, you cannot have more than two Units deal damage to any given opposing Unit.

card.name: The Star League
card.property:
A deck may contain only one Alliance card. Begin the game with this card activated. Alliances are not sites and cannot be scrapped.
If The Star League is in your deck, every Inner Sphere card in your deck loses all affiliations. You get -1 initiative.

card.name: Thunder Hawk (TDK-7X)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Long-Range 3 (If Thunder Hawk is blocked, it may deal up to 3 damage to the target.) <i>One salvo from the <i>Thunder Hawk</i>'s three Gauss rifles can pulverize most light and medium 'Mechs.</i>

card.name: Trojan Horse
card.property:
Play only if unblocked.
Scrap one of your Units. The target receives 7 damage.

card.name: Turkina Prime
card.property: Missile 2 Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Long-Range 2 (If <i>Turkina</i> Prime'' is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: Viper's Maw
card.property:
Play only when attacking and only during battle.
Choose up to 2 opposing, untapped Units that are not in the battle. Tap those Units, which then join the battle.

card.name: Viper (Black Python)
card.property: Overheat 2: +3 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Long-Range 1 (If Viper is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: War Dog (WR-DG-02FC)
card.property: ECM (Units in groups including any with ECM each get +1 armor.) Anti-Missile (Prevent 1 damage from each missile fired at a Unit in a group that includes War Dog.) Long-Range 1 (If War Dog is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.)

card.name: Wolfhound (WLF-1)
card.property: Overheat 2: +1 attack <i>Originally designed for mercenaries, the <i>Wolfhound</i> has become common throughout the Federated Commonwealth after repeatedly proving itself in battle.</i>

card.name: Zhukov
card.property: Vehicle (If Zhukov is damaged, roll a die. On a 5 or 6, scrap it.) Alpha Strike: +2 attack
